title: 真实玻璃折射视觉效果AE/PR插件 Glasswork v1.1.2 Win
author: 大众脸
content: Glasswork 是一款专为 After Effects 和 Premiere 设计的高级视觉特效插件，能够实现高度真实的玻璃折射与反射效果。通过无缝的 GPU 渲染技术，用户可轻松为视频素材添加丰富的图案和风格化视觉元素。其直观的操作界面支持对大量参数进行精细调节，帮助创作者快速实现理想中的视觉表现。适用于广告、宣传片、影视后期等需要高质量玻璃质感的场景。

other.update_notes: 1.1.2 版本修复了应用于调整图层或文本图层时的崩溃问题。
other.description_en: The ultimate video filter that brings unparalleled realism to your glass effects! With seamless GPU rendering, you can effortlessly infuse your footage with a myriad of patterns and styles. But that’s not all—our intuitive interface gives you full control with a plethora of settings, making it a breeze to achieve the perfect aesthetic. Elevate your visuals and let your creativity shatter all limitations!
